people.notes: Known for explosive temper and financial troubles. Frequently involved in get-rich-quick schemes with Uncle Scrooge.

locations.notes: Works for Uncle Scrooge at McDuck Tower branch

aliases: The Richest Duck in the World
people.notes: World's richest duck. Suspected of tax evasion and hoarding. Known to swim in money bin.
Triplet nephews of Donald Duck. Junior Woodchucks members. Often witnesses to Uncle Scrooge's schemes.
Donald's girlfriend. Often frustrated with his behavior but loyal. Owns boutique in Duckburg.
Close friend of Donald Duck. Often acts as mediator in disputes. Works as detective occasionally.
Mickey's girlfriend. Close friend of Daisy Duck. Runs local charity organization.
Well-meaning but clumsy. Often accidentally involved in incidents. Single father to Max.
Known criminal and con artist. Often schemes with or against other villains. Neighbor to Goofy.
Goofy's son. College student. More responsible than his father.

locations.address: UCLA Residential Halls, 330 De Neve Drive

people.notes: Scrooge's main business rival. Suspected of corporate espionage and fraud.
Witch obsessed with Scrooge's Number One Dime. Uses dark magic. Lives on Mt. Vesuvius.

locations.notes: Hidden volcanic lair near Mt. Etna summit

people.notes: Brilliant inventor. Works for Scrooge McDuck. Inventions often backfire.
Gyro's robotic assistant. Small light bulb-headed robot. Very helpful but accident-prone.
Donald's lucky cousin. Supernaturally lucky. Never works but always has money.
Criminal gang constantly trying to rob Scrooge's Money Bin. Led by Ma Beagle.
Genius scientist. Alcoholic. Interdimensional terrorist in some realities. Extremely dangerous.

locations.notes: Secret lab in Ballard neighborhood garage
Remote, secure, represents a former meeting point of Ricks

people.notes: Rick's grandson. Frequently traumatized. Unwilling accomplice to interdimensional crimes.
Rick's daughter. Horse surgeon. Abandonment issues. May have a clone.

locations.address: Emerald Downs Equine Hospital, 2300 Ron Crockett Dr

people.notes: Beth's husband. Unemployed. Insecure. Rick hates him.
Rick's best friend. Former freedom fighter. Now cyborg working for Galactic Federation.

locations.notes: High-altitude, remote, advanced (symbolic of former home)

people.notes: Morty's older sister. Sometimes joins Rick's adventures. More capable than Morty.
Cat-like alien. Rick's friend. Says 'squanch' a lot. Can transform into monster.
Hobbit from Middle-earth. Destroyed the One Ring. PTSD from quest. Now in Valinor.

locations.notes: Former residence, now a tourist spot

people.notes: Loyal companion to Frodo. Gardener. True hero of the story. Mayor of the Shire.
Wizard. Maiar. Guided the Fellowship. Loves fireworks and pipe-weed. Ancient being - age unknown.
Former Jedi Knight. Sith Lord. Redeemed by son. Heavy breather.

locations.notes: Command Center (symbolic of Death Star operations)

people.notes: Former chemistry teacher. Meth cook. Cancer patient. Dead.

tools.name: Google
tools.description: Primary search engine for OSINT research
tools.notes: Use advanced operators for better results

tools.name: Shodan
tools.notes: Requires API key for full access

tools.name: Have I Been Pwned
tools.description: Check if email has been in data breach

todos.text: Interview Beagle Boys about latest heist attempt
Track Rick Sanchez portal gun usage

todos.last_update_comment: All wins legitimate - supernatural luck confirmed

cases.description: Investigation into financial irregularities in Duckburg involving Scrooge McDuck and associates
Tracking Rick Sanchez's interdimensional crimes and their impact on multiple realities
Collection of notable individuals from various universes not connected to main investigations

travelHistory.notes: Annual 'relaxing' trip with nephews (Daisy tagged along)
